90% of the posters, or *convenient posters*, on this forum are ste's little fag ass.

Nobody cares, he's one of those things in life you have to get used to.

Consider him, even though it's far too flattering, as social injustice or prejudice/fear of the different. People like him will never go away, they don't go away in life, and never will.

Eventually they die, horrible, hallowed, shells of existence, but we all do.

That provide any comfort?
